scripts.build: HTTP_PROXY= HTTPS_PROXY= NO_PROXY=* npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ npm_config_proxy= npm_config_http_proxy= npm_config_https_proxy= next build
scripts.build:pages: HTTP_PROXY= HTTPS_PROXY= NO_PROXY=* npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ npm_config_proxy= npm_config_http_proxy= npm_config_https_proxy= npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages
